original_text: The Lord speaks against the country called Hamath. (It is next to the country called Hadrach.) The people in Tyre and Sidon cities are very wise. But the Lord also speaks against them.
korean_text: 그 접경한 하맛에도 임하겠고 두로와 시돈에도 임하리니 그들이 매우 지혜로움이니라

sentences.original_text: The Lord speaks against the country called Hamath
sentences.korean_translation: 주님은 하맛이라 불리는 나라를 향해 말씀하신다

sentences.original_text: It is next to the country called Hadrach
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하드라크라 불리는 나라 옆에 있다

sentences.original_text: The people in Tyre and Sidon cities are very wise
sentences.korean_translation: 두로와 시돈 성의 사람들은 매우 지혜롭다

sentences.original_text: But the Lord also speaks against them
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 주님 또한 그들을 향해 말씀하신다
